00019 #ifndef _IPL98_IMAGECONSTCOLUMNIT1BP_H
00020 #define _IPL98_IMAGECONSTCOLUMNIT1BP_H
00021 
00022 #include "ipl98_types.h"
00023 #include "../kernel_c/image/kernel_functions.h"
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00037 class CImageConstColumnIterator1bp
00038 {
00039 protected: // attributes
00041         const TImage* m_pTImg;
00045     unsigned int m_PixelIndexInByte;
00048         UINT8* m_pCurrByte;
00050         UINT8* m_pEnd;
00051 public:
00058         inline CImageConstColumnIterator1bp(UINT32 ColumnIndex, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex, const TImage* pTImg);
00060         inline CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& operator=(const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& It);
00063         inline CImageConstColumnIterator1bp End() const;
00068         inline CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& operator++() {m_pCurrByte-=m_pTImg->ByteWidth; return *this; }
00070         inline CImageConstColumnIterator1bp operator++(int){CImageConstColumnIterator1bp t=*this; m_pCurrByte-=m_pTImg->ByteWidth; return t;}
00072         inline UINT32 operator*(){return ((*(m_pCurrByte+(m_PixelIndexInByte>>3))) & (0x80>>(m_PixelIndexInByte%8)) )!=0;}
00074         inline const UINT32 operator[](UINT32 i) {return ((*(m_pCurrByte+((m_PixelIndexInByte+i)>>3))) & (0x80>>((m_PixelIndexInByte+i)%8)) )!=0;}
00077         inline friend bool operator==(const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& q);
00080         inline friend bool operator!=(const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& q);
00083         inline friend bool operator< (const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& q);
00084 };
00085 
00086 inline CImageConstColumnIterator1bp::CImageConstColumnIterator1bp(UINT32 ColumnIndex, UINT32 StartIndex,
00087                                                                                                                                   UINT32 MaxIndex,      
00088                                                                                                                                   const TImage* pTImg):
00089                 m_pTImg(pTImg), m_PixelIndexInByte(ColumnIndex%8),
00090                 m_pCurrByte(pTImg->ppAllScanLines[StartIndex]+(ColumnIndex>>3)),
00091                 m_pEnd(m_pCurrByte-pTImg->ByteWidth*(MaxIndex-StartIndex))
00092 {
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 inline CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& CImageConstColumnIterator1bp::operator=(const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& It)
00097 {
00098         m_pTImg            = It.m_pTImg;
00099         m_PixelIndexInByte = It.m_PixelIndexInByte;
00100         m_pCurrByte        = It.m_pCurrByte;
00101         m_pEnd             = It.m_pEnd;
00102         return *this;
00103 }
00104 
00105 inline CImageConstColumnIterator1bp CImageConstColumnIterator1bp::End() const
00106 {
00107         CImageConstColumnIterator1bp t = *this;
00108         t.m_pCurrByte = m_pEnd;
00109         return t;
00110 }
00111 
00112 inline bool operator==(const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& q)
00113 {
00114         return (p.m_pCurrByte==q.m_pCurrByte);
00115 }
00116 
00117 inline bool operator!=(const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& q)
00118 {
00119         return !(p==q);
00120 }
00121 
00122 inline bool operator<(const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator1bp& q)
00123 {
00124         return (p.m_pCurrByte<q.m_pCurrByte);
00125 }
00126 
00127 } // end namespace ipl
